mapper.select: SELECT log.uid, log.user_uid, log.method_uid, log.amount, log.ticket_detail_uid, log.status_, log.created_date AS log_created_date, log.updated_date AS log_updated_date, method.name, method.created_date AS method_created_date, FROM payment_log log JOIN payment_method method ON method.uid = log.method_uid JOIN ticket_detail d ON d.uid = log.ticket_detail_uid WHERE log.user_uid = #{user_uid}

SELECT log.uid, log.user_uid, log.method_uid, log.amount, log.ticket_detail_uid, log.status_, log.created_date AS log_created_date, log.updated_date AS log_updated_date, method.name, method.created_date AS method_created_date, FROM payment_log log JOIN payment_method method ON method.uid = log.method_uid JOIN ticket_detail d ON d.uid = log.ticket_detail_uid WHERE log.user_uid = #{user_uid} AND log.status_ = 'refund'
SELECT uid, method_name, created_date FROM payment_method ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT uid, method_name, created_date FROM payment_method WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY created_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_log ( user_uid, method_uid, amount, ticket_detail_uid, status_ ) VALUES ( #{user_uid}, #{method_uid}, #{amount}, #[ticket_detail_uid], #{status} )
